/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling city street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their facades painted in shades of blue and gray, standing tall against the backdrop of a hazy sky. The buildings are adorned with numerous windows and balconies, hinting at the architectural style of the city. The street itself is lined with trees and shrubs, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. A few cars can be seen on the road, indicating the city's active life. The overall color palette of the image is dominated by shades of blue, gray, and green, reflecting the blend of urban development and natural elements in Beijing.
